name: Nature World Scene
description:
Instructions to play or start

  1. extract using winrar or 7zip
  2. Open files  NatureWorldPackaged  then WindowsNoEditor
  3. click JustEverythingPacked.exe to start playing
  4. Press WASD To move
  5. Press R to restart
  6. Press ESC to quit application  

Ways To Support 

1) Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/avi_game/?hl=en

2) Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu2HUduTC1LrN3VUAJmDisg

Note

  • i tried my best to optimize the scene
  • but it may work only for  mid range to high tier hardware
